description: Begin to familiarize yourself with programming, learn and understand the basic concepts of programming in the C language such as loops, conditions, variables, functions, libraries, pointers, etc.
Learn and understand the concepts of Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) such as classes, objects, inheritance, polymorphism, encapsulation, and abstraction with Java.

Learn the basics of web development including HTML5 for structure, CSS3 for styling, JavaScript for interactivity, and Bootstrap for responsive design.(Completed the frontend web cloning project for Fahasa, in the role of team leader.
